original_title: Faces You Forget: Nights Out in Saigon
overview: In Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Bui Vien street lies in stark contrast to the rest of the city. A place where cultures collide as thirsty backpackers mingle with hard-up local sellers. "Faces You Forget: Nights Out in Saigon" explores this unusual and strained relationship and delves into the lives of the Vietnamese sellers who call this strange place home.
tagline: A film about one strange street in Ho Chi Minh City.
title: Faces You Forget: Nights Out in Saigon
